resources.string: This application reads and writes NDEF messages from/to a NFC tag.\n\nAdditionally the app shows how to work with encrypted data that needs decryption.

There are 5 icons to click on:
1 home = this page
2 read NDEF message
3 personalize = run all neccessary steps to activate UID mirroring withou user interaction
4 activate the mirroring of data
5 write the NDEF template to the tag

Note: This app is working with tag types NTAG213, NTAG215 or NTAG216 only !
This app reads an NDEF message
This example expects a class 4 type tag with an NDEF record (RTD_TEXT).\n\nWhen a tag is discovered the data from all records will be read.
Writes the NDEF message template to the NTAG with defined placeholders for UID, read counter and MAC.\n\nThis is working on tag types NTAG213, 215 or 216 only.
There are 2 steps to do:\n1. press the TEST AND SAVE NDEF SETTINGS button\n2. tap a NTAG21x tag to the reader
Activate the mirroring of data to NDEF message
Activates the mirroring of data (UID, read counter and MAC) in an NDEF message on tapping
Run all steps to personalize a tag for NDEF mirroring

This are the steps that will run when a tag is tapped

1. write the NDEF template to the tag
2. disable all existing mirror
3. enable UID mirroring
4. write the UID-based MAC to the tag
The app will IMMEDIATELY write to an attached tag without any further confirmation !
